scenario: Wawa, a privately held company, is launching a new campaign called "Mornings Made Easy" to provide customers with a variety of beverages at a great value. From January 6 through February 16, Wawa Rewards members can redeem bonus offers for $1 Any Size Hot Coffee, $2 Iced Coffee, and $3 Monster Energy Drinks at any of Wawa's 1,100 locations. The campaign includes a self-serve pour bar with 7 coffee varieties, including limited-time flavors. Wawa Rewards members can earn points on eligible purchases and redeem them for Wawa favorites, including hot coffee, which is the most popular reward item. Wawa has over 1,080 locations across 10 states and offers a wide range of products, including freshly prepared foods, beverages, and fuel services. The company is ranked #22 of America's Largest Private Companies by Forbes and is one of Forbes 2023 America's Best Employers for Women and New College Grads.
